Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and opted to bowl first
Aiden Markram said the wicket would not get any worse
Rovman Powell said West Indies must be able to adapt quickly to new conditions
Kyle Mayers replaced Johnson Charles in the West Indies XI
Tabraiz Shamsi replaced Ottneil Baartman in the South Africa XI
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa won the match by 3 wickets (DLS Method)
West Indies were eliminated from the tournament
South Africa secured the top spot in Group 2 with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by rain, which caused a delay in the start

South Africa needed 123 runs to win, with 108 needed from 90 balls
The match was played in North Sound, Antigua
